product.name: 3Pcs Nesting Stone Drying Mat for Kitchen Counter, Quick Drying Dish Drying Mat with Non-Slip Feet, Super Absorbent Heat Resistant Diatomaceous Earth Dish Drying Mat for Dishes, Bottles, Cups-Gray
product.description:
Each drying mat is equipped with 4 screw legs,which make it elevate from the counter to protect from scratches.
The stone mat has a concave groove around the edges, keeping the water from spilling over the edge and flowing down to the counter.
The bottom of the screw legs come with anti-slip bottom pads, which avoid sliding easily during use.
Each mat is thick enough to withstand the weight of everyday items.
Does its surface scratch easily?
These drying dish drying mats do not scratch easily, even if there is a little scratch, you can use the included sandpaper to sand the surface, and then gently wipe it off.
Are these drying mats easy to install?
These dish drying mats are very easy to install, please stick the included anti-slip foot mats to prevent scratching the countertop floor.
Can it be used in dishwasher?
These stone drying mats are not dishwasher safe, just dilute them with water and they're good as new.
How effective is its absorbency over time with regular use?
Please rest assured that our kitchen dish drying mats are made of high quality material, absorbent and long lasting.
product.bullet_points:
• 【Premium Material】: Our stone drying mat for kitchen counter is made of 100% natural diatomaceous earth, which is a natural mineral material extracted from fossilized diatoms, safe and environmentally friendly, it won't do us any harm. compared with other traditional dish drying mats, long service life, high temperature resistance, suitable for placing hot pots or baking pans, to protect your countertop from damage.
• 【Absorbent and Quick-Drying】:Unlike traditional silicone mats and cutlery mats which are difficult to absorb water, due to the nature of material, our stone dish drying mats have many pores that can quickly absorb and evaporate water, ensuring that your drying area stays clean and dry within minutes.
• 【Space-Saving and Non-Slip】:This 3-piece nested design stone dish drying mat has 145% more drying area than a single mat, these drying stone for kitchen counter features are designed to save your countertop space, when you don't need it, the smaller piece can slide under the larger one,it doesn't take up space and can be stacked, very convenient! The non-slip surface of the dish drying mat and stainless steel feet ensure that it rests firmly on the countertop, preventing accidental slips.
• 【Multi-Purpose Drying Mat】:Our diatomaceous earth dish mats 3 separate pieces in different sizes, which increases their versatility, not only can you place washed dishes, cups, knives, forks, spoons and other utensils, but also can be used to place pet bowls, insulated mats, bathroom and plant trays, it's versatile and helps to beautify the home environment.
• 【Easy to Clean】:These dish drying stones are easy to clean, for light stains, just rinse with running water (do not immerse the stone pad in water), and then wipe with a sponge or a damp cloth, for stubborn stains, you can use the included sandpaper to sand the surface, and then gently wipe, try to avoid the use of food or liquids that will leave a dark stain, such as coffee, oil and sauces.
• 【What You Get】:Our kitchen dish drying mats include 1 large(15.75 in x 11.81 in), 1 medium(13.19 in x 11.81 in) and 1 small(10.75 in x 11.81 in), 12 stainless steel screws, 1 user manual, 3 pieces of sandpaper and 3 pieces anti-slip foot mats(prevent scratching of countertop floor). Due to the special smell of diatomite and the logistics of transportation, before use, you need to use a wet towel to wipe off the surface powder in a circle, and then put it in a ventilated place to dry.
